title: Our Manifesto
text:
Building a minimum viable product doesn't mean lowering quality standards regarding design or code. It will be simple, not simplistic. It will be lean, not sketchy.

We always look to impress the target audience by delivering something that inspires them to act.

A minimum viable product represents the fastest way to develop, validate, and learn about the business hypothesis by testing it against the real world.

Our goal is to deliver something that helps you to learn enough to make your next decision as fast as possible, keeping down costs and time to market.

Build, measure, learn & iterate, fast!
